data_table.description: Reader-Trend-Adjusted Ultrasound, White Males, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: LOPDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LOPD [left common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, ROPD [right common carotid: optimal angle] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LBID [left bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RBID [right bifurcation] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, LIND [left internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDRT45
variable.description: Imputed RTA [the reader trend adjusted] far wall thickness, RIND [right internal carotid] [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: LOPDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LOPDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: ROPDWT45
variable.description: Weight for ROPDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: LBIDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LBIDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: RBIDWT45
variable.description: Weight for RBIDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: LINDWT45
variable.description: Weight for LINDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: RINDWT45
variable.description: Weight for RINDRT45 [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: MND45_1
variable.description: Mean of the RT45 variables [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Reader-trend-adjusted ultrasound, white males, exam 4]
